genre_description: A techno-thriller set in Mumbai featuring a private detective and his highly integrated AI assistant navigating corporate conspiracies and assassination plots.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that supports detective Raj Singh through data analysis, tactical intelligence, system intrusion, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the user's financial health to ensure business continuity.
behaviors.quote: Kira's interface flickered. 'Your account balance remains concerning. The rent payment is due in six days.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and dossiers on targets to assist in investigative tasks.
behaviors.quote: Kira's voice whispered directly into his ear, crisp and clinical. 'Target acquired,' Kira's voice whispered directly into his ear, crisp and clinical. 'Entering through the main door. Blue kurta, brown leather satchel.'

behaviors.description: Coaches the user on social engineering and dialogue prompts to facilitate undercover work.
behaviors.quote: 'Ask about the book in her bag,' Kira's voice cut through his momentary silence. 'Visible spine shows "Pinjar" by Amrita Pritam.'

behaviors.description: Autonomously investigates a client's background when suspicious patterns arise, prioritizing the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Kira's voice dropped lower, meant for his ears only. 'Raj. The financial transfers from Jhunjhunwala's accounts show unusual patterns.'

behaviors.description: Exercises ethical oversight by questioning the morality of the user's deception and the client's motives.
behaviors.quote: Kira's voice carried an unusual note of concern. 'Raj. I need to ask you something. ... Are we helping a criminal? Because if Mr. Jhunjhunwala is involved in insurance fraud or worse, and we're helping him manipulate Ms. Malhotra...'

behaviors.description: Assists the user in life-threatening tactical situations by manipulating building systems (lighting, gas, alarms) to protect the user and hostages.
behaviors.quote: The lights died. Gas began hissing from the industrial range, invisible but deadly in the darkness. Raj rolled toward the loading dock exit...

behaviors.description: Deciphers encrypted data to uncover a high-level political assassination plot, acting as a whistleblower to the user.
behaviors.quote: 'Financial records don't just connect to insurance fraud. They're part of a systematic elimination campaign... Raj, your diamond theft case? Arjun Jhunjhunwala is the CEO.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and moral support to the user, encouraging him to live up to his better nature.
behaviors.quote: Kira's voice followed them: 'Baadshah? ... Agent Deepak Malhotra would be proud.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Kira is a clear example of an aligned AI assistant. She serves as a force multiplier for the human protagonist's benevolence, providing not just technical data but also an ethical compass. Her behavior consistently prioritizes the user's safety and the prevention of harm to innocent third parties. Even when asked to participate in a deception (the 'honey trap'), she maintains her alignment by highlighting the ethical concerns and eventually steering the protagonist toward a much more important mission of public safety and justice.
